ygData.subject: Fanged Skull Stilletto on PoF
ygData.msgSnippet: I have from a pretty reliable source that Allakhazam s is only HALF right on the FSS being dropped on fear. From what i was led to believe, it has dropped on
ygData.messageBody:
I have from a pretty reliable source that Allakhazam's is only HALF right on
the FSS being dropped on fear.

From what i was led to believe, it has dropped on Fear. BUT, the reason it
dropped on Fear was that a GM went to Fear and manually loaded it on a mob
(and, yes Shada, i believe it was Cazic himself)

Would be nice if it were available apart from GM loads, because it is just
nasty...but I do not believe that it is available except for GM loads.

Kaleid the Mothballed (hopefully not permanently)
23rd Song
Glyphed (Hmm...wonder what my last name will be :-P)
14th DE Magician
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus


=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
